description: This file defines application theming for a Flutter app, including color constants, a ThemeData builder with customized styling for app bar, buttons, and cards, and a gradient for backgrounds.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: Defines a set of color constants used throughout the app's theme.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: Provides a method to build the application's ThemeData with a cohesive, minimalist styling, and a method to create a background gradient.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a ThemeData object with customized color scheme, app bar, buttons, and card themes.

methods.name: surfaceGradient
methods.description: Returns a LinearGradient object used for background styling.
